channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What's Next: How Top MLB Signings and Trades Affect New Teams, Free Agency
item.description: When a free agent signs a new contract, there's always a big questions about what's next for the teams involved. We're breaking down all the big deals...

item.title: 2025 NFL Power Rankings Week 13: Which NFC Teams Are Scary?
item.description: Ralph Vacchiano sorts out the NFL's hierarchy after every week of the 2025 season.

item.title: Shohei Ohtani Confirms Intent to Represent Japan in 2026 World Baseball Classic
item.description: The Dodgers superstar plans to play for his home country once again in next year's baseball spectacle.

item.title: Andrej Stojakovic sinks tough spin jumper, plus the foul, extending Illinois' lead over Texas-Rio Grande Valley
item.description: Andfrej Stojakovic sank a tough spin jumper, plus the foul, to extend the Illinois Fighting Illini's lead over the Texas-Rio Grande Valley Vaqueros.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From the 49ers' Win Over the Panthers
item.description: The 49ers kept pace in the NFC West with a win over the Panthers. Here's what we learned.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea, Man United eye new Germany star Ouédraogo
item.description: RB Leipzig midfielder Assan Ouédraogo is a target for Chelsea and Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Pistons tie '90, '04 title teams, win 13th in row
item.description: Guard Cade Cunningham and the surging Detroit Pistons, who set an NBA record for consecutive losses in a single NBA season with 28 in 2023, tied a fra...

item.title: 49ers top Panthers, as Christian McCaffrey beats former team
item.description: It was McCaffrey's first meeting against the Panthers, who traded him to the 49ers in 2022.

item.title: Sources: Bucs get good news on Mayfield's MRI
item.description: The MRI for Buccaneers quarterback Baker Mayfield revealed a low-grade AC joint sprain in his left shoulder but showed no additional damage, sources t...

item.title: Jennings hits Moehrig after MNF over 'cheap shot'
item.description: 49ers wide receiver Jauan Jennings responded to a "cheap shot" from Tre'von Moehrig by throwing an open-handed right cross to the Panthers safety's fa...
